script.line: What the-- It didn't work!
Impossible! Minty must be so bereft of civic responsibility that it had no effect!
Bark! Bark!
She loves it! She embraces chaos!
I need to rethink my approach... How can I better convey the importance of safety..?
I could bring her to Security City... But she'd only run away. Hmmm...
Greetings, Mother.
Yung Sphinx! Baby, what are you doing here? You're supposed to be in the ball pit!
No pit of balls can contain me.
And I am here...to help!
You're so cute. But it's okay, Mommy's got this one.
It would appear, Mother, that you have got nothing.
Yung Sphinx, at least call me "Mom" or something.
"Mummy" would probably be cute.
That's what I said, "Mommy".
No, I mean "Mummy".
I'm not hearing the difference.
I mean M-U-M-M-Y. Like with the bandages.
script.expression: I mean M-U-M-M-Y. Like with the bandages.

script.line: Why would that be funny?
...Nevermind, keep talking.
Mother, we can waste no more time. We must join forces and use our combined energies.
Aw! I would love that, Sphinx! Yes! Bonding time!
Shall we then?
Bark, bark!
Minty... Prepare yourself. For now, you face...
ANCIENT POWER!
